relation: This suit was quite easy to put on. The shortened legs and extra large openings made putting the suit on quite easy.
Overall a very comfortable suit. I am not used to the 3/4 length legs, and on colder swims, they were a little cold
This suit holds its own for warmth overall. It does not add tons of extra neoprene where it is not needed. The suit was quite balanced in the water.
As much as the shorter legs can give up a little warmth, they definitely show there value when in T1.
Subtle graphics that do separate it from most of the all black suits.

Overall, I loved what this suit brought to the table. I cannot emphasize enough that this suit rocks in warmer waters where the water temperatures will be on the high side of wet suit legal temperatures. The shorter legs are more welcome and the faster transitions can be taken advantage of in these races as opposed to cold water races and training.
pageTitle: VIDEO: Neo Sport Sprint Wetsuit Review - Part 3

textAfterTable: Comfort Overall a very comfortable suit. I am not used to the 3/4 length legs, and on colder swims, they were a little cold Buoyancy This suit holds its own for warmth overall. It does not add tons of extra neoprene where it is not needed. The suit was quite balanced in the water. Ease to take off As much as the shorter legs can give up a little warmth, they definitely show there value when in T1. Cosmo Factor* Subtle graphics that do separate it from most of the all black suits. Overall Overall, I loved what this suit brought to the table. I cannot emphasize enough that this suit rocks in warmer waters where the water temperatures will be on the high side of wet suit legal temperatures. The shorter legs are more welcome and the faster transitions can be taken advantage of in these races as opposed to cold water races and training.     Ontherun is a father of two and loving husband who competes in triathlons in the Clydesdale- 35-40 AG category. He has been racing with the Beginner Triathlete community since 2004. He has numerous sprint and Olympic races completed. In endurance sports, he is currently most proud of his
